DialogueText.Text: Damn it... This is... a rather large set back. Could you not have been more careful with that...?
Ugh, apologies... It was so chaotic with those cultists... I shouldn't be blaming you for their interference.
Let's not lose hope just yet. I'm gonna have a look around, and see if perhaps there's more here that can help us.
You should have a look around as well. Do let me know if you find anything of note.
